title: Ring's Floodlight Cam is $60 off on Amazon right now — it's one of the best smart security cameras you can buy
text:
Ring makes some of the best smart security devices on the market — and the Ring Floodlight Cam is one of its flagships.

It sports an advanced motion detection system, customizable zones, and many other nifty features.

For Amazon Prime members, the Ring Floodlight Cam is on sale for $189, $60 off its original price of $249.

We don't know how long this deal will last, so act quickly if you're interested.

Amazon's Ring makes some of the best smart security devices out there — and the Ring Floodlight Cam is one of its top devices. If you're looking for an HD security camera and outdoor floodlight in one, the Ring is well worth considering.

For a limited time, Prime members can get the Ring Floodlight Cam for $189 on Amazon, which is $60 off its original price of $249.

There's a lot to like about this device. It comes with two built-in floodlights, which can illuminate large areas at night. It also takes 1080HD video with infrared night vision, so you can clearly identify guests (or intruders) from inside.

The camera's also smart. It can detect human-sized objects at up to 30 feet away and sends notifications to your smartphone whenever it detects motion. It also comes with a 110-decibel siren alarm, which you can activate if you're really paranoid. Plus, it works with Alexa, and supports customizable motion zones, which allow you to monitor specific areas at specific times.

We don't know how long this deal will last, so if you're an Amazon Prime member, make sure to check it out ASAP.
description: The Ring Floodlight Cam is one of the best smart security cameras out there. It's $60 off on Amazon for Prime members only.
